title: Best of the Program | Guest: Carol Roth | 9/1/22
description:
Glenn pleads for his audience to read their Bibles and goes into how influential the Bible has been in our society. Recovering investment banker Carol Roth joins to discuss the weirdness of China's housing market and what that means globally. Glenn dives into the lunacy of Australia's new emissions reduction effort and why non-Australians should care.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
